header.title: Every Child Deserves a Helping Hand

homePage.section3paragraph1: Helping Hands to Children was founded in 2023 with a simple goal: to ensure no child is left behind. We work in undeserved communities to provide access to education, healthcare, and basic necessities.
homePage.section3paragraph2: Join us in making a difference today!

aboutPage.ourStoryText: Helping Hands for Children was founded in 2023 with a single goal: to ensure no child is left behind. We work in underserved communities to provide access to education, healthcare, and basic necessities.
aboutPage.ourMissionText: To empower children through education, healthcare, and community support, giving them the tools to build a brighter future.
aboutPage.ourVisionText: A world where every child has the opportunity to thrive, regardless of their circumstances.

donatePage.leftsectionDescription2: A month of meals for a family
donatePage.leftsectionDescription3: Medical care for a child in need

shopPage.visionDesc: Our charity sale features handmade crafts, artwork, and products created by the communities we support. Every purchase helps fund our programs and empowers local artisans. 100% Net Profit is used for the charity service.

localeSwitcher.label: Change language
